com.iUwej.filemanager

Class FileCopy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iUwej.filemanager.FileCopy

  • public class FileCopy
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    iUwej

    Class Summary- A class responsible for copying of a file(s) from one specified path to another. It is also responsible for the deleting of files The methods are all static

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileCopy() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copyDir(java.io.File sourceDir, java.io.File destDir, int bufferSize)
      A static method which recursively copies files from a directory(s) to the destination directory.
      static void copyFile(java.io.File source, java.io.File destination, int bufferSize)
      A static method to a file from one location to another taking source as a file and the destination as a file too
      static void copyFile(java.lang.String sourcePath, java.lang.String destinationPath, int bufferSize)
      Static method for copying a single file from one location to another To copy files in a directory or nested directories, Use the copyDir(File, File, int) static method instead

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

            java.lang.String destinationPath,
            int bufferSize)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Static method for copying a single file from one location to another To copy files in a directory or nested directories, Use the copyDir(File, File, int) static method instead

        java.io.IOException

        public static void copyFile(java.io.File source,

            int bufferSize)
                     throws java.io.IOException

      • copyDir

        public static void copyDir(java.io.File sourceDir,
           java.io.File destDir,
           int bufferSize)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        A static method which recursively copies files from a directory(s) to the destination directory. To copy a single file use the copyFile(String, String, int) method instead as it ensures that the source file is a single file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
